mapper.select: SELECT u.`name`, ROUND(b.duration / 60) as duration, b.progress, COUNT( 0 ) AS frequency FROM `information_browse` AS b LEFT JOIN customer_user AS u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.information_id = #{params.id} GROUP BY b.user_id
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT user_id),0) as nums FROM information_browse WHERE information_id = #{informationId}
